alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 12:47PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lander and northwestern Nye Counties through 115 PM PDT... At 1247 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gabbs, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gabbs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM PDT for north central Nevada...and south central Nevada.
